NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: ClipVibe or FaceLink?
NC.A: {FaceLink} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: ClipVibe or ProfConnect?

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: ProfConnect or ViewTube?
NC.A: {ViewTube} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {1} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {ClipVibe}
